00018 int RawEthernetPacketBuffer::PushPacket(RawEthernetPacket *packet)
00019 {
00020   DEBUGPRINTF(8,"RawEthernetPacketBuffer::PushPacket(size=%u, data=%x, curin=%d, curout=%d)\n",packet->size,packet->data, curin,curout);
00021   if (IsFull()) {
00022     return PACKETBUFFER_FULL;
00023   } else {
00024     this->packet[curin] = *packet;
00025     curin=(curin+1)%bufsize;
00026     return PACKETBUFFER_OK;
00027   }
00028 }

00030 int RawEthernetPacketBuffer::PullPacket(RawEthernetPacket *packet)
00031 {
00032   if (IsEmpty()) {
00033     return PACKETBUFFER_EMPTY;
00034   } else {
00035     *packet = this->packet[curout];
00036     curout=(curout+1)%bufsize;
00037     return PACKETBUFFER_OK;
00038   }
00039 }

00041 
00042 bool RawEthernetPacketBuffer::IsFull() const
00043 {
00044   return (curin+1)%bufsize == curout ;
00045 }
00046 
00047 bool RawEthernetPacketBuffer::IsEmpty() const
00048 {
00049   return  curout==curin;
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 size_t RawEthernetPacketBuffer::Numitems() const
00054 {
00055   return curin>=curout ? curin - curout : bufsize - (curout - curin) - 1;
00056 }
